question: Hey all,I am getting tested for the 2nd for Leukemia next Wednesday. It occurred to me that maybe I could get a life insurance policy on myself, just in case the tests come back positive.I know nothing about insurance. Can anyone give any pointers? Is it possible to activate life insurance within a week?I should mention I have a ton of other health problems, the biggest being diabetes 2. But, I am in very good control of this.Fast responses are appreciated! Thanks!
title: Cancer and Life Insurance
